revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Ls-wvl-front.jpg|thumb|Front of LS-WVL |image1_size = 100px |caption = Buffalo LinkStation Pro Duo |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.buffalo-asia.com/forhome/office_nas/double_drive/ls-wvl-ap/ |sp = http://buffalo.jp/support_ap/support/products/ls_wvl.html |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Buffalo |model = LinkStation Pro |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Duo |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = LS-WVL |page_start_date = February 2, 2022 |page_start_origon = https://techinfodepot.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Buffalo_LinkStation_Pro_Duo_(LS-WVL) |series = LinkStation |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6282;88F6282A0C160, Armada 300, (Feroceon core), rev 1 (v5l); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 <!-- TE --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.2 / 1.6 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 512 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;; |ram1_num = 2 <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = yes |ethoui = 4C:E6:76
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA II |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CN4 --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- blank --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- 1/2014 --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- 747464128665 --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- 9SIA6ZP3KP5279 --> |asin = <!-- B00NP7JUO2 --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- China -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest==
===Firmware=== *Alternative firmware, forked from original: [https://gadgets.tomatosoft.hu/buffaloplex-firmware-1-71-3-66-halloween-released/index.html TomatoSoft] • [https://gadgets.tomatosoft.hu/portfolio/buffalo-linkstation-plex/ Plex] *GitHub page of the alternative firmware, you can fork and update to :latest package and rebuild with the latest original firmware: [https://github.com/GaryTomato/buffaloplex Plex]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/new-to-the-charts-buffalo-linkstation-pro-duo-wvl/ ''Buffalo LinkStation Pro Duo (LS-WVL)'' Review on '''SNB''']
